授業目的: This course aims to develop students' academic research and writing skills to pursue further studies.
到達目標: Students will be able to research and write an academic paper on the topics related to UN and Foreign Affairs.

トピック.授業計画1: Couching session will be conducted on demand basis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Student is requested to conduct individual research on daily basis.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【650】Individual Research on the United Nations and Foreign Affairs　１／Individual Research on the United Nations and Foreign Affairs
